Class HadoopKerberosKeytabAuthenticationPlugin

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, GobblinInstancePlugin

    public class HadoopKerberosKeytabAuthenticationPlugin
extends BaseIdlePluginImpl
    Loads a Kerberos keytab file for Hadoop authentication.
